UnitDefinition.Name: Kinetic conversion type
UnitDefinition.Description: Kinetic conversion defines whether a default factor 1 is used or a kinetic conversion factor based on a kinetic model (see table KineticConversionFactors).

Unit.Name: Convert using conversion factor of 1
Unit.Description: A default conversion factor of 1 is used to convert biological matrices.

Unit.Name: Convert using kinetic models
Unit.Description: Kinetic conversion factors are used to convert biological matrices using factors or PBK models (not yet implemented).
